name: Precise Dice (MhmdSheref)
description:
In this puzzle game created for the 2022 GMTK GameJam you play as a die that can only move the amount of steps on its top in any set direction, your goal is to lead the die to the red plate so it can... find a new home? 

 Downtown Glow by Ghostrifter & Devyzed
